hooks.command: cd '/home/ubuntu/mcp_agent_mail' && uv run python -m mcp_agent_mail.cli file_reservations active '/home/ubuntu/mcp_agent_mail'
cd '/home/ubuntu/mcp_agent_mail' && uv run python -m mcp_agent_mail.cli acks pending '/home/ubuntu/mcp_agent_mail' 'IvoryOwl' --limit 20
cd '/home/ubuntu/mcp_agent_mail' && uv run python -m mcp_agent_mail.cli file_reservations soon '/home/ubuntu/mcp_agent_mail' --minutes 10
cd '/home/ubuntu/mcp_agent_mail' && uv run python -m mcp_agent_mail.cli list-acks --project '/home/ubuntu/mcp_agent_mail' --agent 'IvoryOwl' --limit 10
cd '/home/ubuntu/mcp_agent_mail' && uv run python -m mcp_agent_mail.cli file_reservations list '/home/ubuntu/mcp_agent_mail'
